auth_success_passwordEmailSent: Password reset email has been sent.
auth_error_userEmailCouldNotBeVerified: User email could not be verified.
auth_error_userHasNoSuchEmail: User {{username}} has no such email. Please double-check.
auth_error_couldUpdateUserWithEmail: Could not update user with email {{email}}.
auth_error_passwordTokenInvalid: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.
auth_email_content_emailVerificationMess:
Hello {{username}},

Please find below the link to verify your email.
{{- domain}}/#/verify/{{token}}

If you did not request this email and remember it your password ignore this email.
auth_email_content_passwordResetMessage:
Hello {{username}},

Please find below the link you have requested to reset your password. 
{{- domain}}/#/reset/{{resetPasswordToken}}

  If you did not request this email and remember it your password ignore this email.
auth_email_content_passwordChangeMessage:
Hello {{username}},

This is a confirmation that the password for your account using this email {{email}} has just been changed.
.
user_error_userWithIdCouldNotBeFound: User with id {{id}} could not found.
user_error_userCouldNotBeFound: User with username {{username}} could not found.
user_error_userCouldNotBeRetrieved: User with id {{id}} could not be retrieved.
user_error_usersCouldNotBeRetrieved: Users with could not be retrieved.
list_error_listCouldNotBeRetrieved: List with id {{id}} could not be retrieved.
token_error_tokenNotValid: This token does not seem to be valid or has expired.
translate_error_couldNotBeTranslated: This text could not be translated.
